caption: The location is inside a house where a couple lives with their two daughters and a pet cat. One of the girls enters an imaginative moment, envisioning a giant crane lifting the house and loading it onto a truck that gradually drives away. The two girls wander around inside the house. Later, a woman in yellow clothing enters. The girls chat inside the house and interact with the pet cat. During the day, the girls and the one in the blue clothes sell lemonade outside. A boy in a blue shirt arrives, takes a sip of the lemonade, but spits it out. The girl in the blue dress lies down on a bed, while the girl in yellow clothing walks in the garden.
